xyz.morphia.annotations

Annotation Type IndexOptions


  • @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface IndexOptions
    Defines the options to be used when declaring an index.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean background 
      Collation collation 
      boolean disableValidation 
      int expireAfterSeconds 
      String language 
      String languageOverride 
      String name 
      String partialFilter 
      boolean sparse 
      boolean unique 

    • Element Detail

      • background

        public abstract boolean background
        Returns:
        if true, create the index in the background
        Default:
        false

      • disableValidation

        public abstract boolean disableValidation
        Returns:
        if true, disables validation for the field name
        Default:
        false

      • expireAfterSeconds

        public abstract int expireAfterSeconds
        Returns:
        defines the time to live for documents in the collection
        Default:
        -1

      • language

        public abstract String language
        Returns:
        The default language for the index.
        Default:
        ""

      • languageOverride

        public abstract String languageOverride
        Returns:
        The field to use to override the default language.
        Default:
        ""

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Returns:
        The name of the index to create; default is to let the mongodb create a name (in the form of key1_1/-1_key2_1/-1...)
        Default:
        ""

      • sparse

        public abstract boolean sparse
        Returns:
        if true, create the index with the sparse option
        Default:
        false

      • unique

        public abstract boolean unique
        Returns:
        if true, creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors
        Default:
        false

      • partialFilter

        public abstract String partialFilter
        Returns:
        the filter to be used for this index
        Since:
        1.3
        Default:
        ""

      • collation

        public abstract Collation collation
        Returns:
        the collation to be used for this index
        Since:
        1.3
        Default:
        @xyz.morphia.annotations.Collation(locale="")
